name: Elemential
description:
This game tells the story of an evil mage that lives in a faraway tower. In his free time, this dark magician likes to experiment with potions and magic by mixing and matching them together. He liked it the most when he mixed two elements that were the opposites of each other. 

One day, the mage made a grievous mistake during one of his experiments which ended up disfiguring his already quite dissatisfied minions.

When they saw what he had done to them, they totally had it and decided to revolt against their former boss.

As a player, you take the role of the infamous sorcerer to defend the rooms of his precious tower against the rebelling minions. You fight against them by combining opposing spells and weaponizing their results to use against the deformed minions.
